titleStmt.title: A moderate answer to Mr. Prins full reply to certaine observations on his first twelve questions: vvherein all his reasons and objections are candidly examined and refuted. A short description of the congregationall way discovered. Some arguments for indulgence to tender consciences modestly propounded. By the same author.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.
Robinson, Henry, 1605?-1664?, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Benjamin Allen, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes head Alley at the signe of the Crowne,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Robinson in NUC pre-1956 and John Goodwin in Halkett and Laing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 27."; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes head Alley at the signe of the Crowne
